originalTitle: Chad shuts border with Sudan in bid to stop conflict spreading
title: Chad shuts border with Sudan in bid to stop conflict spreading
content: A Chadian government spokesperson says the decision is aimed at protecting citizens.

originalTitle: Robert Mugabe's son charged with attempted murder in South Africa
title: Robert Mugabe's son charged with attempted murder in South Africa
content: Bellarmine Mugabe and one other man have not commented on the charges after a 23-year-old was shot.

originalTitle: 'I put my bike up for sale - it went from Fife to Kenya'
title: 'I put my bike up for sale - it went from Fife to Kenya'
content: Dr Carrie Ruxton was surprised when a Kenyan cyclist got in touch asking if the bike could help her country's paracycling team.

originalTitle: New Trump tariffs take effect days after Supreme Court decision
title: New Trump tariffs take effect days after Supreme Court decision
content: New tariffs on imported goods come into effect as Trump moves to rebuild his trade agenda after top court's ruling.

originalTitle: Residents raise alarm as violence-hit Guadalajara to host World Cup games
title: Residents raise alarm as violence-hit Guadalajara to host World Cup games
content: Mexican city set to host 2026 World Cup games erupts in violence after army kills the leader of a powerful drug cartel.

originalTitle: In Pictures: Four years of Ukraine war
title: In Pictures: Four years of Ukraine war
content: UN says more than 15,000 civilians and 763 children killed, highlighting the immense human cost of the ongoing conflict.

originalTitle: Russian soldiers tell BBC they saw fellow troops executed on commanders' orders
title: Russian soldiers tell BBC they saw fellow troops executed on commanders' orders
content: Four men expose the horror and brutality of conditions in the Ukraine war, with two saying they saw soldiers being shot for refusing orders.

originalTitle: Mexico sends thousands of soldiers to stop violence after death of drug lord
title: Mexico sends thousands of soldiers to stop violence after death of drug lord
content: A wave of violence has erupted across Mexico since a powerful drug cartel boss died following his capture by special forces.

originalTitle: More than 5,000 flights cancelled as US east coast digs out of record snow
title: More than 5,000 flights cancelled as US east coast digs out of record snow
content: A major snowstorm dumps more than a foot of snow in several areas, bringing power cuts and disruption.

originalTitle: Sesko and Lammens allow Man Utd to dream of Champions League
title: Sesko and Lammens allow Man Utd to dream of Champions League
content: Striker Benjamin Sesko and goalkeeper Senne Lammens are the key figures as Manchester United gain a hugely valuable Premier League win at Everton.

originalTitle: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
title: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
content: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?

originalTitle: Quiz - name every Englishman to score a Champions League hat-trick
title: Quiz - name every Englishman to score a Champions League hat-trick
content: In Newcastle's match with Qarabag, a certain winger became the 11th Englishmen to score a Champions League treble.
